title: In desperate need of help, please dont delete! Can't start league anymore
body:
Hey all!

For some reason my post keeps ketting deleted, WHY? I just want to play and i am in desperate need of help!!!!

I am really lost! I get this error when i try to start the game

http://imgur.com/a/xcClK

And somehow resinstalling is not working! I am really bad with computers, is there someone who can help me?

Please...

replies.body:
Hmmmmm I'm not sure why this type of post would have been deleted unless it was being posted in the wrong section, but let's see if I can get this working again for ya!

Most of the time these dll errors happen when some game files are missing or corrupted, but it should be relatively easy to smooth out. Refer to the image below for a certain file to delete and which one you should run afterwards, and be sure to let me know how this helps!

https://i.gyazo.com/fff6c3138d0ba551eb3712fe007a0adf.png
